verses.verse: But <S%G1161><s%> I determined <S%G2919><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> for myself <S%G1683><s%>, that I would <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> sorrow <S%G3077><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I wrote <S%G1125><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> very thing <S%G846><s%>, <S%G5213><s%> lest <S%G3361><s%>, when I came <S%G2064><s%>, I should have <S%G2192><s%> sorrow <S%G3077><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them of whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> to rejoice <S%G5463><s%>; having confidence <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the joy of you <S%G5216><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> affliction <S%G2347><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> anguish <S%G4928><s%> of heart <S%G2588><s%> I wrote <S%G1125><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> tears <S%G1144><s%>; not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye should be made sorry <S%G3076><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye might know <S%G1097><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> more abundantly <S%G4056><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> hath caused sorrow <S%G3076><s%>, he hath <S%G3076><s%> caused sorrow <S%G3076><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> to me <S%G1691><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G575><s%> part <S%G3313><s%> (that <S%G2443><s%> I press <S%G1912><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> too heavily <S%G1912><s%>) to you <S%G5209><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>.
Sufficient <S%G2425><s%> to such a one <S%G5108><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> punishment <S%G2009><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was inflicted by <S%G5259><s%> the many <S%G4119><s%>;

so that <S%G5620><s%> contrariwise <S%G5121><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> should rather <S%G3123><s%> forgive <S%G5483><s%> him and <S%G2532><s%> comfort <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G3381><s%>, lest by any means such a one <S%G5108><s%> should be swallowed up <S%G2666><s%> with his overmuch <S%G4053><s%> sorrow <S%G3077><s%>.
Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> to confirm <S%G2964><s%> your love <S%G26><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> this end <S%G5124><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> did I write <S%G1125><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I might know <S%G1097><s%> the proof <S%G1382><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%>, whether <S%G1487><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> obedient <S%G5255><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> ye forgive <S%G5483><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> forgive also <S%G2532><s%>: for2532, Genesis63 what I <S%G1473><s%> also have forgiven <S%G5483><s%>, if I have forgiven <S%G5483><s%> anything <S%G1536><s%>, for your sakes1223, Romans9 have I <S%G5209><s%> forgiven it in <S%G1722><s%> the presence <S%G4383><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>;

that <S%G2443><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> advantage <S%G4122><s%> may be gained over <S%G5259><s%> us by Satan <S%G4567><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> we are <S%G50><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> ignorant <S%G50><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> devices <S%G3540><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when I came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Troas <S%G5174><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> when a door <S%G2374><s%> was opened <S%G455><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>,

I had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> relief <S%G425><s%> for my <S%G3450><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>, because I <S%G3165><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> taking my <S%G3450><s%> leave <S%G657><s%> of them <S%G846><s%>, I went forth <S%G1831><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> thanks <S%G5485><s%> be unto God <S%G2316><s%>, who always <S%G3842><s%> leadeth <S%G2358><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> in triumph in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> maketh manifest <S%G5319><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> the savor <S%G3744><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> place <S%G5117><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> a sweet savor <S%G2175><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> them that <S%G3588><s%> are saved <S%G4982><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them that <S%G3588><s%> perish <S%G622><s%>;

to the one3739, Ezekiel3 a savor <S%G3744><s%> from death <S%G2288><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>; <S%G1161><s%> to the other <S%G3739><s%> a savor <S%G3744><s%> from life <S%G2222><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is sufficient <S%G2425><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the many <S%G4183><s%>, corrupting <S%G2585><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> sincerity <S%G1505><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, in the sight <S%G2714><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, speak we <S%G2980><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.
